https://tmrev.io/movie/256277-Chance at Romance 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/stXiBneBvS5mLoALZHJO1X1Vi3C.jpg Samantha Hart is delighted when her online "Chance at Romance" to photographer Heath Madsen eventually results in Heath sending her a first class ticket to visit. Upon arriving for what she expects to be a romantic weekend, however, she learns her online relationship with the widowed photographer was actually manufactured a matchmaking twelve year-old. Sam is anxious to end her trip as quickly as possible, but a nasty bout of weather extends her stay through the end of the week. Chance at Romance
